meanings.sent1: The immortelle in the garden bloomed all year round.
meanings.sent2: She picked an immortelle to press in her book.
meanings.sent3: The immortelle whispered to the other flowers, 'I'll never fade!'
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an immortelle, eternal and unchanging.
meanings.sent5: The immortelle stood proudly among the other flowers, its beauty never fading.

meanings.definition: A type of flower that retains its color and shape when dried.
meanings.sent1: She used an immortelle in her dried flower arrangement.
meanings.sent2: The immortelle looked just as vibrant even after drying.
meanings.sent3: The immortelle joked with the roses, 'I'll still look good when I'm old!'
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like immortelles, preserved and vivid in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The immortelle added a pop of color to the dried bouquet, its hues still vivid.

meanings.definition: A perennial plant with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The immortelle's yellow blooms brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: She admired the immortelle's cheerful yellow petals.
meanings.sent3: The immortelle teased the daisies, 'I'm the sunshine of the garden!'
meanings.sent4: The immortelle's yellow flowers were like drops of sunlight in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The immortelle swayed in the breeze, its yellow blossoms dancing joyfully.
